AT.name: Cube Life: Island Survival
AT.description: Cube Life: Island Survival ist das erste Open-World Survival-Game für Wii U™. Stellen Sie sich vor, auf einer schönen, einsamen Insel gestrandet zu sein... Alle Notwendigkeiten des Lebens – wie Essen, Wasser und Unterkunft – sind hier nicht gegeben. Unser täglicher Bedarf wird nicht erfüllt. Nun liegt es an Ihnen, ob Sie überleben oder nicht. Kannibalen und wilde Tiere erleichtern diese Mission nicht gerade. Um am Leben zu bleiben, müssen Sie auf Entdeckungstouren gehen, Baugeschick beweisen und handwerklich tätig werden. Im Überlebensmodus ist es indes die Aufgabe des Spielers, auf der unbekannten Insel seine Gesundheit aufrechtzuerhalten, Höhlen zu erforschen, Ressourcen zu sammeln und Werkzeuge von Hand zu fertigen. Nutzen Sie den Tag, um sich Essen zu besorgen, die Umgebung auszukundschaften und Bauten anzufertigen. Denn wenn die Nacht sich über die Insel senkt, ist es an der Zeit sich zu verbergen, zu kämpfen und zu überleben. Was Sie in den ersten Minuten des Spiels tun und entscheiden, ist ausschlaggebend dafür, in welchem Maße es Ihnen gelingt zu überleben. Sind Sie in der Lage, um Ihr Überleben zu kämpfen? Aktuelle Funktionen: - Das erste Open-World Survival-Game - Kreativmodus - Überlebensmodus - Multiplayer - Tag- und Nachtzyklen - 300+ Gegenstände und Werkzeuge - Handwerk - Wildtiere - Einheimische - Realistische Grafikeffekte wie Wasserspiegelungen und Sonnenstrahlen - Optimiertes Rendering von Würfeln - Updates – das Spiel wird immer besser und besser!

movies.name: Cube Life: Island Survival - Update Teaser
Cube Life: Island Survival - Trailer

AU.name: Cube Life: Island Survival
AU.description: Cube Life: Island Survival is the first block building open-world survival game for the Wii U™. Imagine being stranded on a beautiful deserted island... All of life's necessities: Food, water, shelter - all of your everyday needs are now gone, and it's up to you to survive. Cannibals and wild animals will not make it any easier on you. You'll need to explore, build, and craft to stay alive. In Creative Mode, the game will allow players to build constructions in 3D generated game worlds. There is no limit to your imagination. In Survival Mode, the player must maintain health, explore caves, gather resources, and craft tools on an unknown island. Get food, explore and build during the day. Hide, fight, and surive as night falls on the island. Update v1.2 features: --------------------- - Block building open-world - Creative Mode - Survival Mode - Multiplayer - Share Custom Maps - 400+ items are now available! New items like ladders, motorboats, diving masks, traps, etc. - Stealth attacks! Approach an enemy from behind and gain the upper hand - Big world to explore at 3,520 x 3,520 blocks - Fight New Enemy Bosses: The Kraken, and Cannibal Boss - Pets (Chickens, Boars, Baby Boars, Monkey and Giant Crabs) - Assign commands to pets now (defensive, offensive, or collect items) - Day/Night cycles - Crafting - Trading - Explosives - Wild animals - Realistic graphical effects like water reflections and sunbeams - Optimized cube rendering 30+fps - Internet Rankings - Updates - the game will keep getting better and better!

movies.name: Cube Life: Island Survival - Update Teaser Trailer
Cube Life: Island Survival - Trailer

movies.name: Cube Life: Island Survival - Update Teaser Trailer
Cube Life: Island Survival - Trailer

BE.name: Cube Life: Island Survival
BE.description: Cube Life : L'Île de la Survie est le premier jeu de survie monde ouvert pour le Wii U™. Imaginez être piégé sur une magnifique île déserte... Toutes les nécessités de la vie: Nourriture, eau, refuge - tout ce dont vous avez de besoin chaque jour n'existe plus et vous devez survivre. Les cannibales et les animaux sauvages ne vont pas vous rendre la vie facile. Vous devrez explorer, construire et forger pour demeurer en vie. En Mode créatif, les joueurs pourront construire des bâtiments dans des mondes du jeu générés en 3D. Il n'y a pas de limite à votre imagination. En Mode survie, le joueur doit se maintenir en santé, explorer des cavernes, rassembler des ressources et forger des outils sur une île inconnue. Trouvez de la nourriture, explorez et construisez durant le jour. Cachez-vous, battez-vous et survivez alors que la nuit tombe sur l'île. Options actuelles : - Le premier jeu de survie monde ouvert - Mode créatif - Mode survie - Multijoueur - Cycles jour/nuit - 300+ d'objets et d'outils à découvrir - Forger - Des animaux sauvages - Des effets graphiques réalistes - Mises à jour - le jeu ne fera que s'améliorer !

movies.name: Cube Life: Island Survival - Update extrait vidéo
Cube Life: Island Survival - bande-annonce

ES.name: Cube Life: Island Survival
ES.description: Cube Life: Isla de supervivencia es el primer mundo del juego de supervivencia para el Wii U™. Imagenese estando estraviado en una hermosa isla desierta... todas las necesidades de la vida: Comida, agua, refugio- todas sus necesidades diarias no estan y le toca sobrevivir. Los canibales y los animales salvajes no se lo haran muy facil. Necesitara explorar, construir y crear para mantenerse vivo. De manera creativa, el juego le permitira a los jugadores realizar construcciones en 3D generando mundos de juegos. No hay limite para su imaginación. En modo de supervivencia, el jugador debera mantenerse saludable, explorar cuevas, reunir recursos y crear heramientas en una isla desconocida. Obten comida, explora y construye en el dia. Escondete, pelea, y sobrevive hasta que llegue la noche a la isla. Caracteristicas actuales: - El primer mundo de juego de supervivencia - Modeo creativo - Modo de supervivencia - Multijugador - Ciclos dia/noche - 300+ articulos y herramientas por descubrir - Crear - Animales salvajes - Efectos graficos realistas - Actualizaciones - el juego ira siendo mejor y mejor!

IT.name: Cube Life: Island Survival
IT.description: Cube Life: Island Survival è il primo gioco di sopravvivenza mondiale per la Wii U™. Immagina di essere bloccato su una bellissima isola deserta ... Tutto il necessario: cibo, acqua, riparo - tutte le esigenze di tutti i giorni sono ormai scomparse, e dipende da te sopravvivere. Cannibali e animali selvatici non renderanno le cose più facili. In modalità creativa, il gioco permetterà ai giocatori di costruire costruzioni 3D di mondi di gioco generati. Non c'è limite alla tua immaginazione. In modalità Survival, il giocatore deve mantenersi sano, esplorare grotte, raccogliere risorse e strumenti artigianali su un'isola sconosciuta. Procurarsi il cibo, esplorare e costruire durante il giorno. Nascondersi, lottare e sopravvivere quando cala la notte sull'isola. Quello che fai nei primi minuti di gioco determinerà quanto sarai in grado di sopravvivere. Sai lottare per sopravvivere? Caratteristiche presenti: - Il primo gioco mondiale di sopravvivenza - Modalità Creativa - Modalità Survival - Multigiocatore - Cicli giorno / notte - 300+ oggetti e strumenti che permettono di scoprire - Destrezze - Animali selvatici - Abitanti locali - Effetti grafici realistici come riflessi d'acqua e raggi di sole - Il rendering del cubo ottimizzato - Aggiornamenti - il gioco continua a migliorare e meglio!

movies.name: Cube Life: Island Survival - Update teaser trailer
Cube Life: Island Survival - trailer

movies.name: Cube Life: Island Survival - Update extrait vidéo
Cube Life: Island Survival - bande-annonce

MT.name: Cube Life: Island Survival
MT.description: Cube Life: Island Survival is the first block building open-world survival game for the Wii U™. Imagine being stranded on a beautiful deserted island... All of life's necessities: Food, water, shelter - all of your everyday needs are now gone, and it's up to you to survive. Cannibals and wild animals will not make it any easier on you. You'll need to explore, build, and craft to stay alive. In Creative Mode, the game will allow players to build constructions in 3D generated game worlds. There is no limit to your imagination. In Survival Mode, the player must maintain health, explore caves, gather resources, and craft tools on an unknown island. Get food, explore and build during the day. Hide, fight, and surive as night falls on the island. Current Feature: - Block building open-world - Creative Mode - Survival Mode - Multiplayer - Day/Night cycles - Crafting - Trading - 300+ Items and Tools - Explosives - Pets - Wild animals - Realistic graphical effects like water reflections and sunbeams - Optimized cube rendering 30+fps - Internet Rankings - Updates - the game will keep getting better and better!

All of life's necessities: Food, water, shelter - all of your everyday needs are now gone, and it's up to you to survive. Cannibals and wild animals will not make it any easier on you. You'll need to explore, build, and craft to stay alive. In Creative Mode, the game will allow players to build constructions in 3D generated game worlds. There is no limit to your imagination. In Survival Mode, the player must maintain health, explore caves, gather resources, and craft tools on an unknown island. Get food, explore and build during the day. Hide, fight, and surive as night falls on the island. Update v1.2 features: --------------------- - Block building open-world - Creative Mode - Survival Mode - Multiplayer - Share Custom Maps - 400+ items are now available! New items like ladders, motorboats, diving masks, traps, etc. - Stealth attacks! Approach an enemy from behind and gain the upper hand - Big world to explore at 3,520 x 3,520 blocks - Fight New Enemy Bosses: The Kraken, and Cannibal Boss - Pets (Chickens, Boars, Baby Boars, Monkey and Giant Crabs) - Assign commands to pets now (defensive, offensive, or collect items) - Day/Night cycles - Crafting - Trading - Explosives - Wild animals - Realistic graphical effects like water reflections and sunbeams - Optimized cube rendering 30+fps - Internet Rankings - Updates - the game will keep getting better and better!
